channel.title: How to set up a 1 client only
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I was woundering, how can I make it so if people try to connect to my server using a different client, they log in but they get a message saying that they don't have my client and they need to download it and for the people who have it don't get the message. I tried making it with the interface maker but there is no background.

item.title: How to set up a 1 client only
item.dc:creator: @jackboy89 jackboy89
item.description:
@jackboy89 wrote:

I want it to be like this.

Client 1 = Not My Client
Client 2 = My Client

Client 1 logs into server = message pops up to tell them to get Client 2.
Client 2 logs into server = no message pop up.

I think that’s a bit better.

Read full topic
item.source: How to set up a 1 client only

item.title: How to set up a 1 client only
item.dc:creator: @Ikoedlalampara Ikoedlalampara
item.description:
@Ikoedlalampara wrote:

do you mean on your client or your server, like you want a message to popup in your server when they login or do you want it to popup when they load your client, i think your trying to say you want something to popup if their on a different client, and trying to connect to your server or what?

Read full topic
item.source: How to set up a 1 client only
